content: a p r i l b l o s s o m s q u a r e designed by krokoklint/lina kittel stitches and about the designer abbreviations my name is lina kittel and i am an independent designer chain - chain from sweden however my crochet language is english slip_stitch - slip_stitch and i write all my patterns in us terms single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half double you find me on instagram and ravelry under the name crochet krokoklint which is a word i made up by mixing the double_crochet - double_crochet swedish word for hook krok with the area where i live bobble - 3 double_crochet together klinten i imagine a krokoklint being a fantasy amigurumi fp - front post which i at some point will have to design bp - back post picot3b - ch3 and work a sl st in the fl of the top and the strand of about the square the double_crochet st see picture round 6 april bloom square made with drops paris and a 4 5 mm pop - popcorn 5 double_crochet hook is a 31x31 cm square made for the 2023 ravelry and close with a slip_stitch bam cal however you can use any type of yarn you which is a part of the st prefer and therefore gauge is not important the square space - space can be used for e g blankets or cushions round - round ** - repeat the pattern the number of times indicated colours used pattern notes all rounds begin with a standing stitch if you prefer a chain drops paris start simply make a chain 1 for single_crochet and half double_crochet chain 2 for double_crochet a - 41 mustard b - 23 light grey all rounds are closed with an invisible join to the second c - 62 sage green stitch or with a slip_stitch to the first choose the method d - 16 white that suits you best e - 63 desert rose f - 59 old pink round 1 colour a into a magic_ring *1 half_double_crochet + ch1* x 8 times stitch count 8 half_double_crochet 8 ch1 round 2 colour b start around any chain-space *1 pop + ch1* x 8 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count 8 pop 8 ch1 round 3 colour c start around any ch1-space *1 dc3bobble ch2 1 dc3bobble chain 1 and make a fpsc around the pop from the prev round ch1* x 8 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count 16 dc3bobble 8 ch2 16 ch1 8 fpsc © 2023 krokoklint design made by lina kittel all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or for free over the internet or offline you may sell items made from this pattern but please do not claim this pattern as your own if you wish to share this
